attributes.action: Keep people who commit multiple homicides with rape etc in prison to serve the complete sentence given to them by a judge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simply, if a man (or woman) kills two girls after raping them, then attempts to pervert the course of justice, he/she has forfieted his/her right to lenient sentences. That person by his/her action has demonstrated a complete lack of remorse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
